sources.description:
A wronged cowboy races against time to clear his name after being framed for rustling stolen cattle. But his mission takes a dark turn when he uncovers a brutal crime against a young woman‚Äîand vows to bring the real culprits to justice. Expect dusty standoffs, moral dilemmas, and a showdown you won‚Äôt forget!

metadata.Plot: A gunslinger on the run for a murder he didn't commit goes to New Mexico where he hopes to find a person who can exculpate him. While on his way he finds a girl who has been kidnapped and tortured, sets her free and then takes his revenge at gunpoint.
metadata.Writer: Giorgio Stegani, Harry Whittington, Jos√© Luis Jerez Aloza
